events.name: Lithium Supply Chain Challenges
events.wd_description: Currently no global market exists for lithium, and high prices make it more economical to bring new mining operations online.
events.description: Currently no global market exists for lithium, and high prices make it more economical to bring new mining operations online.

events.name: High Prices for Lithium
events.wd_description: High prices for lithium make it more economical to bring new mining operations online.
events.description: High prices for lithium make it more economical to bring new mining operations online.

events.name: Slow Supply Response
events.wd_description: The process of bringing new mining operations online could take several years for permitting and construction to take place, making supply response slow.
events.description: The process of bringing new mining operations online could take several years for permitting and construction to take place, making supply response slow.

events.name: Recycling Potential
events.wd_description: The supply chain also shows the potential for recycling and reusing lithium carbonate from finished applications.
events.description: The supply chain also shows the potential for recycling and reusing lithium carbonate from finished applications.

events.name: Supply Chain Challenges
events.wd_description: There is no global market for lithium, and high prices make it more economical to bring new mining operations online.
events.description: There is no global market for lithium, and high prices make it more economical to bring new mining operations online.

events.name: No Global Market
events.wd_description: Currently no global market exists for lithium.
events.description: Currently no global market exists for lithium.

events.name: High Prices Economical
events.wd_description: High prices make it more economical to bring new mining operations online.
events.description: High prices make it more economical to bring new mining operations online.

events.name: Competing Applications and Market Power
events.wd_description: The competition between automotive and non-automotive applications for lithium, and the market power exerted by current producers, can influence supply and pricing.
events.description: The competition between automotive and non-automotive applications for lithium, and the market power exerted by current producers, can influence supply and pricing.

events.name: Competing Applications
events.wd_description: Other end-use applications of lithium, such as portable electronics, compete with automotive applications for supply.
events.description: Other end-use applications of lithium, such as portable electronics, compete with automotive applications for supply.

events.name: Market Power
events.wd_description: Current producers can influence the market by controlling prices, affecting the entry of new producers.
events.description: Current producers can influence the market by controlling prices, affecting the entry of new producers.
